WorkItem.Description: Stoneskin totem is not included in the buffs list, and from everything I've seen recently it stacks with everything (i used to think it didnt but apparently it does) so i'm wondering why this isnt in the buffs list, at least it isnt for the bear module.

Comments.Message: 99% sure that it doesn't stack with Devotion Aura, unless they changed something recently, which would be really weird. We'll try to add it to the buffs list, but until then you can just use Devotion Aura for the same effect.
yeah i was sure also but i watched as it stacked, it was weird.
i just confirmed it again for myself, because i wasnt entirely sure but they all definitly stack.
Can you link your source for us?

I did a little checking of my own:

[For]

A post on Wowhead where a player confirmed it in-game last February
http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=58753#comments

Wowwiki:
http://www.wowwiki.com/Stoneskin_Totem

[Against]

A post on wow forums (they say it used to but stopped after 3.0.2):
http://forums.worldofwarcraft.com/thread.html?sid=1&topicId=16102301646&pageNo=3

I tried to check in-game on live but I couldn't get any of my tard guildies to join a group and actually check the buff.
Can someone test this on 3.2.2 PTR, with highest ranks of Stoneskin Totem and Devotion Aura?
you allowed it in the list but you didn't allow it to be selected with devo, I tried to modify that in the xml but it keeps resetting to default when i start running rawr.
It's always stacked.  I used to run 10mans in Naxx with a death knight and a restoration shaman and we tested it back then.  It has never not stacked.
